name: Outdoor Research Verglas Gaiters - Men's
description: Technical gaiters for climbing and hiking. Rugged Cordura panels hold up to abrasion and prevent your crampons from putting holes in them.Upper panel is 3-layer Pertex® Shield with an abrasion-resistant 70-denier ripstop nylon face.Lower panel is hard-wearing 500-denier Cordura® nylon.Overlapping hook-and-loop closure is easy to put on and take off.Reinforced bootlace hooks keep gaiters in place.Buckle top closure provides a tight seal.Adjustable TPU-reinforced polyester webbing instep strap holds up to trail and mountain abuse.
